flavor: Some distant ancestor was an elf, eladrin, drow, or other fey humanoid. Though the generations have diluted your fey heritage, you still feel a kinship with your cousin races. Who was this ancestor? Why was this ancestor important? How did you learn about this mysterious connection? How has it changed your life? Associated Quests: Trace the sundered branches of your family tree to reconnect with your distant fey relatives; spread reverence for Corellon to a region where nonfey have forgotten or rejected his gifts; create a lasting pact between two warring communities of elves and humans, dwarves, or another race.
name: Fey Blood
